Nothing happened. Looks like it's on a timer.

Busy Signal.

Hey, this is all your fault!

Brilliant Work!

character.statement: Let's get to work!

How our friend here was able to survive for over 13 years in a shipping crate with no outside water!

exchange.question: What was that?
exchange.answer: We've got to go help him!

exchange.question: What's the plan?
exchange.answer: Rats... zombified rats! When we dumped the blueberry juice into the sewers, they must have gotten to it.

exchange.question: I'm afraid we may have bigger problems.
exchange.answer: Take this extra concentrated zombie antidote.

character.statement: What happened? I feel like I just woke from the longest nap in history.

Brains!

Samuel Brains, the owner of Berry Delicious Smoothies.

On the house!
Rats!
